updates.update_userinfo: Pebble appstore now on Android + new partners
updates.update_content:
We're happy to announce that the Pebble Android app featuring the Pebble appstore is now available for download from the Google Play store. It's taken a bit longer than expected, but we wanted our Android users to enjoy the same seamless and delightful experience we recently provided to Pebblers on iOS. Special thanks to the Pebble users and developers who tested our Android beta builds: your help and feedback was invaluable.
If you’re looking for apps to get started with, check out a few of our favorite Android companion apps:

updates.update_userinfo: It’s time! We’re shipping Pebble Steels.
updates.update_content:
We’re please to announce that Pebble Steel is now shipping. Early orders are leaving the factory today, and shipping confirmation emails are starting to go out. We appreciate your patience while we slowly ramp up production to make sure each Pebble Steel meets a high production quality.
Still considering making Steel yours? Check out what others have to say:
"It’s the only smartwatch we’d recommend anyone buying right now." The Verge Awards: CES 2014 »

updates.update_userinfo: Meet Pebble Steel + Pebble appstore + new partners
updates.update_content:
Two thousand and thirteen was an incredible year for Pebble. We shipped to you, our amazing Kickstarter backers, landed at Best Buy, AT&T and Amazon, enabled iOS 7 notifications, launched SDK 2.0 and more. Today, with over 300,000 Pebbles on wrists all over the world, we’re back in Las Vegas and have some really great news to share with you.
First, we’re getting ready to launch the Pebble appstore — the very first open platform for sharing apps optimized for wearables. The appstore will live within the existing Pebble smartphone app on your iOS or Android smartphone, so you can find and download Pebble apps directly from your phone.

updates.update_userinfo: Something Special Coming This Way to CES...
updates.update_content:
Hello Pebblers and happy new year!
It's finally time to show off some of the work that Team Pebble has been working furiously on. Please join us Monday, 6 January at 11 AM Pacific (2 PM Eastern) for an announcement from Eric, streaming on getpebble.com. 
Pebblers who were part of our CES announcement last year can tell you: you won’t want to miss this! Eric will be sharing news for people new to Pebble, as well as long-time supporters and developers.

updates.update_userinfo: Do Not Disturb + More Notification Controls
updates.update_content:
Happy holidays! We’ve been working hard (like elves in a workshop) to improve the Pebble experience and platform. Today, we’re happy to announce the release of PebbleOS v1.14, which addresses a number of features that you have been asking for. To get these new features on your Pebble, open the Pebble iOS or Android app to begin the process. (Visit here for extra help updating your firmware.) If you haven't already, you can visit our blog and sign up for our newsletter in the upper right corner.
What’s New

updates.update_userinfo: iOS 7 Notifications Update Now Available + Caller ID
updates.update_content:
We're happy to report the iOS 7 notification we announced last week has been approved by Apple. The latest Pebble app for iOS v 1.3 is now available for download in the iTunes Store!
Once you download the Pebble App for iOS, you will be prompted to upgrade Pebble to firmware version 1.13 automatically. If this doesn't happen for some reason, just hard close the Pebble App for iOS and then reopen it.

campaign.story:
Estylo 1.1 is the first and ONLY wooden stylus to work on capacitive touch screens such as that of the iPad. At Plai our goal was to create a completely eco friendly product that would inspire the imagination. Designed for artists seeking greater accuracy over their work, it can also be used for writing or simply navigating the web. Inside Estylo we use high quality conductive materials so that no extra pressure is needed for it to be detected. In other words, Estylo is the pencil of NOW.
We need your support, because without you we are nobody. We have some cool rewards and will start shipping Estylo 1.1 one week after our deadline. Our project is unique in that we are manufacturing Estylo ourselves. Some of funding money will go towards a sanding machine that is almost complete. Other funding money will go towards new packaging. And all the extra money will go towards research and development of Estylo 2.0.
Features:
* Great for drawing, sketching, writing, playing games, reading ebooks or navigating the web.
* Magnetically attaches to the iPad 2.
* Ergonomic design that adapts to the natural grip of the hand.
* The front tip works between 5 to 70 degrees.
* Dual tip stylus. The back tip is perfect for more detailed work.
* No extra pressure is needed for the tips to function.
Estylo 1.1 works on: all generations of iPad, iPhone and iPod touch. Samsung galaxy tab, Droid and other Android devices with a capacitive touch screen.
Stay tuned as we'll be posting new videos and updates with our progress. If you have any questions or comments, let us know!

updates.update_content:
We've all seen that movie where a plane is on a mountain and barely enough room is left for take off. Suspense builds and it barely lifts off as it reaches the edge and the movie continues. We kinda experienced that with this Kickstarter project. Their was a point where I thought we weren't gonna make it. Thank goodness we did. We shipped out the replacement styluses to select backers and you should be receiving them soon. At the bottom is a vid of my 3 year old niece using Estylo 1.8.
We realized that you can't please everybody. Even if Estylo turned into a machine gun and gave you massages some people would still complain. We will continue to improve Estylo and Estylo 2 is definitely in the works. But our current collective creative and engineering energy is being focused on our next project . FastType is a new way to type really fast with just 1 hand or thumb. A brief video is provided in .

Cool we're alive! Just wanted to give thanks to all the backers for your patience. We've contacted every backer, about 1% hasn't responded back. Those who have reconfirmed address have received the Estylo's and the rest have shipped which should be arriving anytime soon.
We will scroll through our comments and send backers who received an Estylo that didn't work upon arrival a new one. We've started contacting some and the rest will be contacted by the end of this week.
Thank you for pushing us forward and being honest with your critiques. They motivated us to keep on going and improving. With your support we were able to exponentially improve our manufacturing process and greatly improve the functionality of Estylo's main tip. Happy holidays and happy new year!

Here's a quick tutorial on how to use Estylo. Once you get over the slight learning curve it becomes easy to use.
Remember that the front tip works in various angles but must be somewhat centered. The back tip must also be somewhat centered but works in less angles.

For those who pledge $13,$22,$25,$30,$45,$58 and your color of choice is black, please check your email. Your order is ready to ship. Any questions email shipping@plai.tv
For those with color Estylo's  thank you for your patience.If you want to change your order from color to all black Estylo email shipping@plai.tv. We are working day and night to have every Estylo shipped out. Thanks!

updates.update_userinfo: A place for Estylo, Art and Technology.
updates.update_content:
You are invited to take part in our growing community dedicated to discussing and sharing everything related with Arts in technology and Technology in the arts. It's also a medium for you to stay in contact and discuss issues with other Estylo users and also for interacting in a more immediate and personal way with the Plai team.
Just click on the link and press Like:
www.facebook.com/EstyloPencil

updates.update_userinfo: Red/black Estylos ready to ship from LA!
updates.update_content:
Hello guys and gals, greetings from sunny Guadalajara, Mèxico. You may ask yourself what's the status on the process. The red/black Estylo shipment we announced a few days ago is taken care of, they are already on departure from LA.
Bealive it or not, we have been working non-stop for the orders to reach their destination so all you people who haven't gotten an E-mail do not need to worry. For the next batch we are trying our best to include even more Estylos per shipment.

Hello everyone, first of all, we apologize for the delay and continue thanking you for your support, we encountered a few setbacks and several adjustments were needed in order to deliver your product with utmost quality.
The batch has arrived, the arrangements for shipping have been made so it's time for the Estylos to leave our warehouse in LA and find a new home. Please get back to us when you recieve yours.

Hello everyone, hope you are having a wonderful day.
This is a good day becuase the first batch of 500 styluses was sent to Los Angeles, from there we will ship every Estylo. It's supposed to arrive there in about 2 or 3 days, then everything will start rolling like a snowball, and everyone will start getting their Estylo and posting about it.
In this final stage, we would like to take the opportunity to thank each and everyone of you for making this project possible.

Hi everyone, my name is Dario. I just joined the Plai team and I'm in charge of answering any questions or comments you have. Looking forward to helping you!
Cheers.

campaign.story:
What is this project?
This is an alternate version of a previously successful deck here on Kickstarter.
Original link : http://www.kickstarter.com/projects/lancetmiller/lance-millers-new-steampunk-playing-card-deck

When I was first creating this deck I posted an image (see below) of a black and white concept drawing for the deck. People loved it so much they instantly demanded that I produce them. As I was already engaged in developing the full color version of the deck I put off the notion until after all the artwork had been completed.

Now that the original concept is being printed, I can go ahead and approach doing these black and white versions. I recently ran a poll to figure out which deck people liked of the two variations: (white with more grid like structure, or black with more depth). To my surprise, I got an overwhelming response to make both! So here they are :)
What will you do with extra funds?
Any extra funds received will be used to buy uncut sheets of the deck to give to pledges and to create merchandise to commemorate the launch of the deck. Also if enough money is raised, it will be used for professional photography, national advertisements and a video trailer.
How will you notify us of your progress?
There will be regular updates with design changes, new designs for face cards, custom artwork displays, and time-lapsed videos cataloging the creation. They will be posted in the updates section, as well as a bi-weekly progress email.
LEGAL: BICYCLE, BICYCLE and Design, BICYCLE Logo and associated marks, logos, designs and finishes are trademarks of The United States Playing Card Company.

updates.update_userinfo: Latest project update from Lance T. Miller
updates.update_content:
Hi everyone, I just wanted to drop a little note to let you all know about a very special project I am working on. The best news is its right here on Kickstarter and you're all welcome to participate. I've been contacted by a Hollywood production team to create a highly detailed deck of cards that will be used as the main prop for a TV show pilot!
Plot: Tommy Blades, is a young, aspiring magician who travels to Harbor city after the mysterious disappearance of his father and the murder of his mother. He quickly attains fame and climbs the ladder of Casinos to become the city's leading act. He combines his unique style of magic with the sword work he learned from a wandering desert warrior on his travels to the city. However, strange instances begin to occur in Tommy’s life, and he soon realizes that his well developed talents are nothing compared to a hidden power he harbors. A potential that would have the leaders of the earth seeking him out for the source of his incredible gift.

Folks, please take a look at your spam folders and add: info@lancetmiller.com as a safe sender. This is the email I am using to send everyone shipping confirmations. If you've not already received your packages, most other packages are shipping out tomorrow: Monday October 1st, and will be to you soon. 

Please double check your addresses in your shipping confirmation. We've made every effort to correct people's addresses as they've emailed us. However, there is still a chance we've not received notification about your specific address change. If your confirmation email shows a different shipping address than you wish to receive your package, please email me immediately!!! 

If any mail gets returned due to address changes that we've not received notification about, there will be a charge to re-mail those packages. 

Thank you all for your continued support, and communication. 

- Lance

OK. The biggest travel section of my year is done. Here's what it looked like briefly: (4 days and over 39 hours on the road) I had the week before packed with travel as well but not quite this intense. I know my travel bears little relevance to you receiving your rewards (aside from preventing me from packaging them), but a lot of you have come to love the craziness that is my life so I am sharing this. If you don't want to read about the schedule just skip to the last paragraph in this update. ;)
OK. The biggest travel section of my year is done. Here's what it looked like briefly: (4 days and over 39 hours on the road)

Thursday - Friday

622 miles: 11.5 Hours OH-NYC

Saturday

Sunday

Monday - Tuesday

546 miles WV to home

Total miles: 2217 not including brief detours for gas, food, rest stop etc.

Total driving time: 39 hours/25 mins not including time spent in other people's cars going to functions

updates.update_userinfo: Travel section done. Onto reward processing!
updates.update_content: Actually, seriously, it's not party time, I can't help but be excited.

Hello Everyone! I had an amazing time in Cincinnati this week. Whilst on site at USPCC I got the shipping cleared up and they are already on their way to my house!!! So what does that mean? That means that as soon as I get the decks, we will begin fulfillment. Kickstarter Backers of course will be the #1 priority. You guys know how I roll.

So what you'll see is this: I will have the decks very early this week, and
Mike (http://www.bmpokerworld.com/),
Jason (the1eyedjack.com) and
John ()
will get their decks at the same time. That's called drop shipping and that doesn't mean that I don't care about you guys, it's just how the retail world works. They get shipped factory direct so they can have them for the launch date. Other than that, all other decks will be shipped from me to backers and my pre-order customers on my site and you all should know by now, I won't sleep until everyone has their packages. Especially after this wait.

The official launch date will be September 25th, but all Kickstarter backer's decks will be shipped prior to this date! 

- Lance
The day has finally come! The cards are all printed and shiny looking :D

Hello Everyone,
Great News! USPCC emailed yesterday and said that the Black and White Edition cards will be printed the week of August 6th and will ship within the following 2-3 weeks!!! 

So, now that we have an official timeline, I will begin releasing details and trailers for the effects that come with the decks. Make sure to pay particular attention to my Facebook page: http://facebook.com/lancemillerdecks and the main Kickstarter project update thread for more info.

campaign.story:
WE LOVE OUR LOYAL BACKERS!!!!

We are happy to announce that we have been SUCCESSFULLY FUNDED after only ONE WEEK!!!!
& the iLIDmk-1 is OFFICIALLY GOING INTO PRODUCTION!!!
A Huge Thank thank you to all of our amazing backers, we couldn't have done it without you!
We'll keep you posted with all the cool updates like this one as we go through production process with cool pics & video's to come.

You can also follow our progress on our Facebook page & by joining the conversation on twitter @iLID_iPhonecase
If you haven't pre ordered your iLIDmk-1 yet its not too late!! you still have a couple of days left to take advantage our our discounted prices & free LIMITED EDITION 1GB USB stick!!
  ORDER NOW & RECEIVE YOUR SPECIAL GIFT CARD FOR CHRISTMAS
                                    (ILIDMK-1 case shipping in January)

Welcome to our funding page!
We have a great idea but we need your help to turn it into a real product.  The iLIDmk-1 will retail for $39.95 but you can now get one for just $30! + FREE 1GB World's thinnest USB stick exclusive to our Kickstarter supporters!
We have a patent pending product we're proud of and believe in, but it's not complete! We need your support.

Our goal on Kickstarter is clear... we must help humanity with their bulky pockets, allowing everyone to dance, walk, run & travel without being weighed down!

We must raise enough support to take the iLIDmk-1 through the rest of design and final product development.
Young, Australian and on the hunt for ways to reduce the clutter in our pockets, we hit on the idea to create a hinged-back iPhone case that could hold key, cards and cash.
          The iLID iPhone Case is the world’s thinnest iPhone wallet.               

What is the iLIDmk-1 World’s thinnest iPhone Wallet?
Our case consists of 2 thin profile polycarbonate shells that are joined together to create a hinged iPhone Wallet. Inside is a specially designed money clip. 
·       Only 17mm thin & feather lite at 30g
·       Main bay designed to hold up to 3cards
·       Money clip for holding your cash
·       Top bay can hold your key, an SD memory card or your Second Sim card!
                                         Doubles as a Kickstand!

Reducing everyday carry has been satisfying for us, At only 17mm thin this case is barely noticeable in your pocket.
 FREE 1GB World's thinnest USB exclusive to our Kickstarter supporters!
Why all that money?As we've found out, tooling is expensive! We need to reach our $10,000 funding goal in order to pay for it! This is where you come in, by pledging, backing, sharing the love on Facebook & twitter or pre ordering you can help us do the the seemingly impossible!
           Please help support us & make this awesome case a reality!

By raising support for us not only will you receive your very own iLIDmk-1 AND the world's thinnest 1GB USB stick, you'll also look just that little bit sexier walking down the street ;-) Bulky pockets begone!!

As a bonus to our Kickstarter supporters we are also providing the World's thinnest USB stick!
Please spread the word on Facebook & Twitter by clicking the buttons under  our video at the top of the page.

Warm regards,
Darren & Simon

PS FREE SHIPPING TO AUSTRALIA & USA!!

updates.update_userinfo: “iLIDs On A Plane” - iLIDs Dispatched From China!!!
updates.update_content:
Hi guys,
Thank you so much for your patience,
We are happy to announce the ilids have left the factory in china and are being sent to our fulfillment houses!!!
From fulfillment they will be shipped off individually to your personal address and you will receive a tracking number in your email from this point.
We’ll send out our next update when our fulfillment houses have acknowledged their arrival.

Hi!

We've finally got our photography back, (our project got pushed aside due to their commitments with larger clients). But not to worry we have great news!

As you can see the images below detail our final product, & its amazing!
We've also gone above and beyond here and secured a rubberised soft touch material, whilst adding significantly to our cost base, we believe it's well worth it!

We have had a number of emails asking us when we're finally going to ship & rightfully so. (it's killing us that it's taken soo long to get these crazy cases out! Just seems like one delay after another).
 
BUT Finally the day has come!

We have just received word from our manufacturer that our order is due for completion in 3-4 days. After a rocky start the manufacturer has managed to secure the correct plastic blend needed for production (took them longer than expected)
A set back that wasn't helped by a few public holidays thrown into the mix. But,



As it stands, once the iLID's have finished production over the next few days, they will then be packed up & transported to our fulfilment houses (takes a few days in transit). From there they will be dispatched from the fulfilment house in country to your door.

To our dear & loyal supporters…
Latest iLIDs are AMAZING!!!

Production is LIVE

& We have signed off for an initial order of 40,000 units!!

Very exciting news!
Lead time is two weeks.

In the mean time we have sent our samples off to Professional photographers.
(We’ll post an update with the pics as soon as they arrive).

The shots will then be uploaded to our website, featuring in both the new product page & fresh slider images on the home page.

We’ll see you next time when our photography arrives!!

Take care,

The iLID Team

Hi,
Great news our manufacturer is “very happy with the new iLIDs," and shipped the latest samples off last week for our approval.
Unfortunately there has been a delay at Sydney airport and we won’t receive them until Monday.

updates.update_userinfo: Manufacturer is “very happy with the new iLIDs"
updates.update_content:
Hi,
We hope you have had a safe & enjoyable Easter break from everyone at the iLID team.
It’s been a couple of weeks since our last update. Where we found out our first run had irregularities preventing us from sending off our beloved iLIDs.
We would like to sincerely thank everyone for the emails of generous support & kind feedback.

So……  We have just received the first 2000 piece production run and have found irregularities in the first batch of iLIDmk-1’s.
We have deliberated (stressed) over this situation and have unfortunately decided that we will not ship these iLIDs.
Whilst the majority appears to be ok, we don’t want to put your valuables at potential risk by shipping a batch that we are not completely happy with.

G'day guys,
We know its been a while since our last update, we've been crazy busy getting these iLIDs ready and whilst we encountered a few hurdles along the way with tooling, a bad batch of money clips (or two) and public holidays we're glad to say that we are finally...
IN PRODUCTION!!!!!!!

G'day Guys,
Thanks for you patience as we head for the home stretch with this project.
We understand that you are eager to get your hands on the case. Rest assured SO ARE WE!!!
Please be mindful that when you back a kickstarter campaign you are backing an idea. Not a ship in 24 HRS campaign. Kickstarter was designed to develop ideas and concepts that resonate with the backer. Turning an idea into a reality takes time, energy and reworks. It takes time to the process.
